abstract: Walgreen says it will pay about $438 million for a collection of 144. drugstores, mostly in the South that operate under the brands USA Drug, Super D Drug, May’s Drug, Med-X and Drug Warehouse.
snippet: Walgreen says it will pay about $438 million for a collection of 144. drugstores, mostly in the South that operate under the brands USA Drug, Super D Drug, May’s Drug, Med-X and Drug Warehouse.
lead_paragraph: Walgreen, the nation’s largest pharmacy chain, is growing ever-larger.

headline.main: Walgreen, on a Buying Binge, Announces Another Deal
